author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Be smarter about pools when updating.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/property.c
(report_info_t): Add a file-specific property hash.
(push_state): Create file-specific hash.
(open_dir): Do not expand directory names here.
(handle_fetch): Do not short-cut open_dir invocation check; use the right
temp pool to expand our file name; call the file-specific hash to walk
(handle_propchange_only): Use the right temp pool to expand our file name;
call the file-specific hash to walk.
(fetch_file): Use file-specific prop hashes.
(start_report): Expand dir names when we start processing them; use the
temporary pool while we build up properties;
(end_report): Do not open the dir when we delta-ify a file (saves space);
use the right prop hash and pools to set properties.

msg: * subversion/po/pt_BR.po: Fix stutter.

author: rooneg
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r19143 for backport.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Simplify propfind report parsing and be smarter with pools.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/property.c
(prop_state_e): Add states that we can be in for a PROPFIND.
(prop_info_t): Structure to hold the currently parsed property.
(svn_ra_serf__propfind_context_t): Remove in_prop, in_response, collect_cdata
flags (moved to prop_state_e); remove ns, attr_name, attr_val, attr_val_len,
attr_encoding (moved to prop_info_t).
(push_state): New function to control our XML state.
(start_propfind, end_propfind, cdata_propfind): Rewrite to use common state
code and keep an eye on our pool usage by using temporary pools.
(svn_ra_serf__deliver_props): Ensure our property elements are in the same
pool as the hash we are putting them into.
